mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, blog = #{blog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headImage = #{headimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, uuid, name, age, photo, height, weight, blog, headImage, account, password, sex from user
